title: Bad gateway private.riotgames
body: Was trying to see my profile stats and how much I have spent but it keeps saying bad gateway. I looked on other threads and saw nothing to help this problem someone help please.

replies.body: It's back up as of now it just worked for me was just gonna let you guys know
Woohoo, glad to hear everything is okay now!  Thanks for helping out!
I'm out of town working at the moment I'll try and check on the computer at the hotel in a few hours after I get back and let you know if I'm still having the same problem

All good, it turns out that the page isn't working for myself and a few others as well.  I'll pass this on, though I might not be able to offer an eta or information right away.  Thanks for the report!
Thanks I'll keep trying it when it gets resolved I'll post it on here if you haven't already thanks for the follow up and keep up the good work guys
Yea it's still showing bad gateway I've tried it on mine and three other phones all the same thing
Thanks for the follow up!  Are you able to try on a PC or another network entirely?

Did you mean the [privacy page](http://privacy.riotgames.com)?  This has some info about your account that we offer players, with additional details if you're willing to pay the processing fee for it.  I hope that helps!
